description: Lists scan results aggregated by a target resource.

parameters.name: filterCriteria
parameters.description: The filter criteria. accountIdFilters (list) --- The criteria's account ID filters. (dict) --- The CIS string filter. The comparison value of the CIS string filter. The value of the CIS string filter. checkIdFilters (list) --- The criteria's check ID filters. failedChecksFilters (list) --- The criteria's failed checks filters. (dict) --- The CIS number filter. lowerInclusive (integer) --- The CIS number filter's lower inclusive. upperInclusive (integer) --- The CIS number filter's upper inclusive. platformFilters (list) --- The criteria's platform filters. statusFilters (list) --- The criteria's status filter. (dict) --- The CIS result status filter. The comparison value of the CIS result status filter. The value of the CIS result status filter. targetResourceIdFilters (list) --- The criteria's target resource ID filters. targetResourceTagFilters (list) --- The criteria's target resource tag filters. (dict) --- The tag filter. The tag filter comparison value. The tag filter key. The tag filter value. targetStatusFilters (list) --- The criteria's target status filters. (dict) --- The CIS target status filter. The comparison value of the CIS target status filter. The value of the CIS target status filter. targetStatusReasonFilters (list) --- The criteria's target status reason filters. (dict) --- The CIS target status reason filter. The comparison value of the CIS target status reason filter. The value of the CIS target status reason filter.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token from a previous request that's used to retrieve the next page of results.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The account ID for the CIS target resource.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The platform for the CIS target resource.

nested_items.name: scanArn
nested_items.description: The scan ARN for the CIS target resource.

nested_items.name: failed
nested_items.description: The number of checks that failed.

nested_items.name: passed
nested_items.description: The number of checks that passed.

nested_items.name: skipped
nested_items.description: The number of checks that were skipped.
